name: AIS - Artificial Intelligence Spatial
description:
AIS is a first person survival game.

You awaken from a death-defying fall, escaping from a floating facility in the sky. Work together with a blinded AI to complete your escape to freedom.
Work together with the AI by communicating with her through your microphone.

Non exhaustive list of voice commands:
* Wake up (To start the game)
* Shoot (Start shooting)
* Stop (Stop shooting)

Use the arrow keys in order to navigate, and your mouse to aim.
